tool_description: Unlock the Power of Youtube Keyword Research for Your Youtube Channel with our API. Get Accurate Monthly Search Volume, Keyword Difficulty, and Competition Details to Drive Traffic and Boost Views!

api_list.name: Keyword Research
api_list.description: Get exact and related keywords information including monthly search volume, SEO difficulty, and competition score.

required_parameters.name: keyword
required_parameters.description: The keyword for which you want to retrieve search data.
